one approach i've used in similar situations is:

=3D> GET /isleapyear?2010=

<=3D 404 Not Found

=3D> GET /isleapyear?2012
<=3D 200 OK

how you model t=
he _representation_ can depend on accept headers:
- image/* might return gr=
een check for 200, red x for 404
- text/plain might return "This is a leap =
year" or "This is not a leap year"
- text/html can return both
- etc.

mca
=
http://amundsen.com/blog/
http://mamund.com/foaf.rdf#me
